evs.metric.metrics
Class ModifiedBoxPlotPooledByLead

java.lang.Object
  evs.metric.metrics.Metric
      evs.metric.metrics.RawMetric
          evs.metric.metrics.ModifiedBoxPlot
              evs.metric.metrics.ModifiedBoxPlotPooledByLead
All Implemented Interfaces:
EnsembleMetric, java.lang.Comparable
public class ModifiedBoxPlotPooledByLead
extends ModifiedBoxPlot

Constructs a modified box-and-whisker plot with a set of thresholds. The boxes represent the empirical pdf of errors for the forecasts, pooled by lead time.

Version:
4.0
Author:
evs@hydrosolved.com

Constructor Detail

ModifiedBoxPlotPooledByLead

public ModifiedBoxPlotPooledByLead(BoxPooledLeadPointsParameter points,
                                   ForecastTypeParameter fType,
                                   UnconditionalParameter unconditional)
Attempts to construct a modified box plot with a set of thresholds and a parameter indicating the forecast types for which the box plots will be constructed.

Parameters:
points - the number of thresholds to include
fType - the forecast types
unconditional - is true to always use unconditional pairs, false to use conditional pairs when available
